title: Increases penalties for promoting prostitution when an internet website is used and for promoting prostitution or patronizing a prostitute five or more times
summary: Increases penalties for promoting prostitution when an internet website is used; increases penalties for promoting prostitution or patronizing a prostitute four or more times.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          626

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  KLEIN  -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Codes

       AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to prostitution crimes

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. Section 230.30 of the penal law, as amended by chapter 627
    2  of the laws of 1978, is amended to read as follows:
    3  S 230.30 Promoting prostitution in the second degree.
    4    A person is guilty of promoting prostitution in the second degree when
    5  he knowingly:
    6    1. Advances prostitution by compelling a person  by  force  or  intim-
    7  idation to engage in prostitution, or profits from such coercive conduct
    8  by another; [or]
    9    2. Advances or profits from prostitution of a person less than sixteen
   10  years old[.];
   11    3. COMMITS THE CRIME OF PROMOTING PROSTITUTION IN THE THIRD DEGREE AND
   12  THE  MANAGING,  SUPERVISING,  CONTROLLING  OR OWNING OF THE PROSTITUTION
   13  BUSINESS OR ENTERPRISE INVOLVING PROSTITUTION INVOLVES  THE  USE  OF  AN
   14  INTERNET WEBSITE; OR
   15    4. COMMITS THE CRIME OF PROMOTING PROSTITUTION IN THE THIRD DEGREE AND
   16  HE  OR SHE HAS BEEN PREVIOUSLY CONVICTED OF THE CRIME OF PROMOTING PROS-
   17  TITUTION IN THE THIRD DEGREE FOUR OR MORE TIMES.
   18    Promoting prostitution in the second degree is a class C felony.
   19    S 2. Section 230.05 of the penal law, as added by chapter 627  of  the
   20  laws of 1978, is amended to read as follows:
   21  S 230.05 Patronizing a prostitute in the second degree.
   22    A  person  is  guilty of patronizing a prostitute in the second degree
   23  when, being over eighteen years of age, he [patronizes] OR SHE:
   24    1. PATRONIZES a prostitute and the  person  patronized  is  less  than
   25  fourteen years of age; OR

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03646-01-1

       S. 626                              2

    1    2.  HE  OR  SHE  COMMITS  THE CRIME OF PATRONIZING A PROSTITUTE IN THE
    2  FOURTH DEGREE OR PATRONIZING A PROSTITUTE IN THE THIRD DEGREE AND HE  OR
    3  SHE  HAS BEEN PREVIOUSLY CONVICTED OF THE CRIME OF PATRONIZING A PROSTI-
    4  TUTE IN THE FOURTH DEGREE OR  PATRONIZING  A  PROSTITUTE  IN  THE  THIRD
    5  DEGREE, OR ANY COMBINATION OF SUCH CRIMES, FOUR OR MORE TIMES.
    6    Patronizing a prostitute in the second degree is a class E felony.
    7    S 3. This act shall take effect on the first of November next succeed-
    8  ing the date on which it shall have become a law.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to prostitution crimes
